comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Built in 1905. Strangely the stone causeway is now replaced by a metal and wooden walkway (did it wash away?), and the bottom half of the lighthouse (where the bell is) is now enclosed. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Bradleys_Head_Lighthouse_Sydne...

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks for adding that link, it does appear to have had cosmetic changes. I've changed the date to "after 1905".
